item.title: Flash Hash: Oct 09, 2022
item.description: This episode includes Nasdaq trading crytpo, proof-of-work going extinct, and VCs highjacking growth in new networks.

item.title: Flash Hash: Sept 11, 2022
item.description: This episode includes the Ethereum merge, Crypto Leaks piece on Avalanche and Kyle Roche, and decentralized weather stations.
